scripts.release-bregnhoj: snowpack build && sed -i 's/bregnhoj\///g' build/index.html  && scp -r build/* fmadsen@foadell:/home/fmadsen/www_root/domains/bregnhoj.com/
scripts.release-meisnermadsen: snowpack build && sed -i 's/bregnhoj\///g' build/lisogkarsten.html && scp -r build/* fmadsen@foadell:/home/fmadsen/www_root/domains/meisnermadsen.dk/ && scp build/lisogkarsten.html fmadsen@foadell:/home/fmadsen/www_root/domains/meisnermadsen.dk/index.html
scripts.release-snesl: snowpack build && scp -r build/* fmadsen@foadell:/home/fmadsen/www_root/domains/snesl.dk/bregnhoj/ && scp build/snesl.html fmadsen@foadell:/home/fmadsen/www_root/domains/snesl.dk/bregnhoj/index.html
